EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Forge – Preparing for Takeoff on March 10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Honeywell Forge—formerly known as GoDirect—is coming soon to your flight department. On March 10, you’ll have access to this expanded enterprise performance management (EPM) offering via your current subscription. Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Forge for BA - 1.png]]> for a snapshot of what it looks like.
What is Honeywell Forge?
In-flight connectivity, flight planning and optimization, plus flight database services in a single, seamless platform, covering:
Who has Access?
Anyone who is a customer of our Honeywell Forge service whether it’s flight planning, connectivity airtime, navigation databases or datalink will have access to the platform. Starting on March 10, an icon on your Honeywell portal will appear; click on the icon, and you’ll have immediate access to Honeywell Forge.
New decade, new name. Same excellent quality of service.
Everything you loved about GoDirect is now part of Honeywell Forge, an enterprise performance management platform with the industry’s most comprehensive connected software offering for business aviation.
Questions? Please contact your sales representative. We can’t wait to hear from you.
Honeywell Forge
